content:
TITLE: Initializing TinyMCE with Code Sample Plugin
DESCRIPTION: Example of a complete, executable TinyMCE initialization with the code sample plugin enabled.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: js
CODE:
```
tinymce.init({
  selector: 'textarea', // change this value according to your HTML
  plugins: 'codesample',
  toolbar: 'codesample',
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: AsciiDoc Page Metadata Fields
DESCRIPTION: Required metadata fields for documentation pages including navigation title, description, and keywords.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: asciidoc
CODE:
```
:navtitle:          // Descriptive title for the navigation bar, if omitted nav defaults to title field.
:description:       // Detailed description at page level for the header section under the title.
:keywords:          // Comma-separated list of keywords in the content.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Overriding TinyMCE URL for Individual Live Demo
DESCRIPTION: This AsciiDoc snippet shows how to override the TinyMCE URL for a single live demo in the documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: asciidoc
CODE:
```
liveDemo::{sub-directory-name}[script_url_override='URL_to_script_file']
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Overriding TinyMCE URL in Live Demos
DESCRIPTION: This YAML snippet demonstrates how to override the TinyMCE URL for all live demos in the Antora playbook configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
asciidoc
  attributes:
    tinymce_live_demo_url: URL_to_script_file
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: AsciiDoc Live Demo Reference
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to reference live demos in documentation using AsciiDoc syntax.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: asciidoc
CODE:
```
liveDemo::{sub-directory-name}[]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Referencing Live Demos in Documentation
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to reference a live demo in the documentation using AsciiDoc syntax.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: asciidoc
CODE:
```
liveDemo::{sub-directory-name}[]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: AsciiDoc URL Linking Syntax
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to create links in AsciiDoc format for documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: asciidoc
CODE:
```
hello, http://www.example.com[text to link] to the URL example.com.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building and Serving TinyMCE Documentation
DESCRIPTION: These commands build the documentation and start a local server to view the compiled documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn build
yarn serve
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with Yarn
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the necessary dependencies for the TinyMCE documentation project using Yarn package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning TinyMCE Documentation Repository
DESCRIPTION: This command clones the TinyMCE documentation repository from GitHub to the local machine.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone git@github.com:tinymce/tinymce-docs.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Changing Directory to TinyMCE Docs
DESCRIPTION: This command changes the current directory to the cloned TinyMCE documentation repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd tinymce-docs
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Markdown Link References
DESCRIPTION: Reference-style link definitions used in the Code of Conduct document for the Contributor Covenant homepage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tinymce/tinymce-docs/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
[homepage]: https://www.contributor-covenant.org
```
